question: the book Dalail al - Khayrat by Imaan Jazuli. What kind of book is it ?
answer:
QUESTION

the book Dalail al - Khayrat by Imaan Jazuli. What kind of book is it ? I think its about seerah. Also is it authentic? And is it a sufi type book?

ANSWER


Share:

The book, ‘Dalaailul Khayraat’ is a book in which the author (Shaykh Abu Abdillah Muhammad ibn Sulaiman ibn Abi Bakr al-Jazuli [ra]) has compiled the various different forms of Durood (sending salutations upon Rasulullah [sallallaahu alayhi wasallam]).

The author of ‘Kashfuz-zunoon’ (Hafiz Khalifah [ra]) has praised this compilation. (Kashfuz-zunoon vol.1 pg.759). We don’t have a copy of this book and cannot comment further.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Moulana Muhammad ibn Moulana Haroon Abasoomar
FACULTY OF SPECIALTY IN HADITH SCIENCES
